name: The Meeting
description: Oil painting on cardboard box, 108x67cm, 2020. Through the process of this very detailed painting this scene emerged in which there is a meeting or negotiation between Lon Chaney and a cyclops in a surreal landscape. It may also represent a meeting of the abstract and the figurative, chance and intention, the known and the evoked coming together. This was the second work where began using recycled materials as a base.
